sen.j: 西中筋通（にしなかすじどおり）は京都市の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Nishinakasuji-dori Street is one of the streets in Kyoto.
Nishinakasuji-dori Street is one of the streets in Kyoto.
Nishinakasuji-dori Street is one of the streets in Kyoto.

sen.j: 東西は堀川通と油小路通に挟まれているが醒ヶ井通の延長線上ではない。
sen.e: Although the street is sandwiched by Horikawa-dori Street and Ssamegai-dori Street at its eastern and western ends, it is not the extension of Samegai-dori Street.
Although the street is sandwiched by Horikawa-dori Street and Ssamegai-dori Street at its eastern and western ends, it is not the extension of Samegai-dori Street.
Although the street is sandwiched by Horikawa-dori Street and Ssamegai-dori Street at its eastern and western ends, it is not the extension of Samegai-dori Street.

sen.j: 南北は六条通から花屋町通という距離も短く、あまり知られてない通りである。
sen.e: It is a short and relatively unknown street sandwiched by Hanayacho-dori Street and Rokujo-dori Street at its northern and southern ends.
It is a short and relatively unknown street sandwiched by Hanayacho-dori Street and Rokujo-dori Street at its northern and southern ends.
